name: ecmarkup
description: Custom element definitions and core utilities for markup that specifies ECMAScript and related technologies.

scripts.lint: eslint bin && eslint lib && eslint test
scripts.update-pages: node bin/ecmarkup.js spec/index.html _index.html && git checkout gh-pages && rm index.html && mv _index.html index.html && git add index.html && git commit -m "update pages" && git checkout master
scripts.update-baselines: echo for f in test/*.html; do node bin/ecmarkup.js $f $f.baseline; done | bash

author: Brian Terlson
